text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh alzmu 'anfusakum bialeamal btaet allah wajtnab mesyth, wdawmu ealaa dhlk wa'iin lam ystjb alnaas lkm, fa'iidha faealtum dhlk fala yadurukum dalal man dll 'iidha lzmtm tariq alastqamt, wamrtm bialmaeruf wnhytm ean almnkr, 'iilaa allah marjieukum jmyeana fi alakhrt, fykhbrkm baemalkm, wyjazykm elyha
